query:
(SELECT id, cycleId, title, weekNumber, weekGroup, type FROM weeks WHERE type = 'live' LIMIT 2)
UNION ALL
(SELECT id, cycleId, title, weekNumber, weekGroup, type FROM weeks WHERE type = 'topic' LIMIT 2)
UNION ALL
(SELECT id, cycleId, title, weekNumber, weekGroup, type FROM weeks WHERE type = 'exercise' LIMIT 2);
